title: Alternating Bicep Curl
description:
Alternating Bicep Curls are a classic arm workout that targets the biceps brachii, helping to build size and strength.

How to Perform:
- Stand upright, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward.
- Curl one dumbbell up toward your shoulder, keeping your elbow close to your torso.
- Squeeze your biceps at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down.
- Repeat with the other arm, alternating between left and right.
